participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and resilient, Alex often reflects on life's challenges and tries to find positive aspects in difficult situations.
participant_1.background: my father is in the army. i recently was fired and had to get a new job. i work in the insurance business. my mom passed away when i was young.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and pragmatic, Jamie prefers practicality over trends and finds joy in simple pleasures like dance.
participant_2.background: i don't care about fashion. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i hate the color orange. i dance on the weekends.
